mapper.select:
select id, add_user_id, xm_id, xm_name, company_id, company_name, status, zj_id, user_id, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_NAME, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6 from zjk_choice where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and add_user_id like '%${addUserId}%'
and xm_id like '%${xmId}%'
and xm_name like '%${xmName}%'
and company_id like '%${companyId}%'
and company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and zj_id like '%${zjId}%'
and user_id like '%${userId}%'
and DEL_FLAG like '%${delFlag}%'
and CREATE_DATE like '%${createDate}%'
and CREATE_USER like '%${createUser}%'
and CREATE_USER_NAME like '%${createUserName}%'
and UPDATE_DATE like '%${updateDate}%'
and UPDATE_USER like '%${updateUser}%'
and UPDATE_USER_NAME like '%${updateUserName}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
